alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lee County through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cypress Lake, or near Fort Myers, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Iona, Cypress Lake, St. James City, Villas, Three Oaks, Saint James City, Whiskey Creek, Page Park, Page Field Airport, Punta Rassa, Fort Myers Villas and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
